Statute.Title: Anishinabek Nation Education Agreement Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord en matière d’éducation conclu avec la Nation des Anishinabes, Loi sur l’)

Minister.Text: Introduced by Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs

General.Text: General, 2017, c. 32, s. 2 (definition of Agreement), s. 6 (not a treaty) and s. 12 (ss. 114(1) and 115 to 117 of Indian Act cease to apply)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2017, c. 32, s. 19 in force on assent 14.12.2017; ss. 1 to 16 and its schedule in force 01.04.2018
CIF, SOR/2024-278 in force 16.12.2024 see s. 3
